title: Checkpoint sync failed on mainnet

labels.name: TeamChupa
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Chupacabara Team

body:
### Description

Checkpoint sync failed on mainnet with Besu 22.7.1. I am starting over with snap. I don't have time to reproduce this right now and get you debug logs; sticking this here to pick up again later.

```
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:26.634+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockRetriever | Received conflicting pivot blocks for 15378991.
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:26.634+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockRetriever | Move pivot block back to 15378941 and retry.
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:26.634+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockConfirmer | Confirm pivot block 15378941 with at least 5 peers.
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:26.800+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-1 | INFO  | PivotBlockConfirmer | Received 1 confirmation(s) for pivot block header 15378941: 0xe4ba9b939f11db2631e7f8b3d1a98c8f9d7c20424a163478ae1c9a5053c0b9cf
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:26.814+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockConfirmer | Failed to confirm pivot block 15378941. Received conflicting headers: 0xe4ba9b939f11db2631e7f8b3d1a98c8f9d7c20424a163478ae1c9a5053c0b9cf (1),0x2b244bc00f6c6d79be42f4ffaccc4179e7468016990916e1f51e03229629a38a (1)

execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:26.979+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-1 | INFO  | PivotBlockConfirmer | Received 1 confirmation(s) for pivot block header 15378891: 0x642e8a39f8811d8dbcc97ba4257e5af9dad06046cde6d6c111ac6d4adf2c8523
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:26.994+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockConfirmer | Failed to confirm pivot block 15378891. Received conflicting headers: 0x290cbf19595a9e30fb9a06652afccb2c526dda856f1816c781caf9e93033c741 (1),0x642e8a39f8811d8dbcc97ba4257e5af9dad06046cde6d6c111ac6d4adf2c8523 (1)

execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:26.994+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockRetriever | Move pivot block back to 15378841 and retry.
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:26.994+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockConfirmer | Confirm pivot block 15378841 with at least 5 peers.
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:27.164+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-1 | INFO  | PivotBlockConfirmer | Received 1 confirmation(s) for pivot block header 15378841: 0x78e112034ccf98bda7326ffdbc6ebe3d617f5b8320e5a59bb83a4b9e1ff29aab
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:27.174+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockConfirmer | Failed to confirm pivot block 15378841. Received conflicting headers: 0x5b3664a9264e7348f1b3afc8ee3a1c304ac8d950d845a027582546677c785096 (1),0x78e112034ccf98bda7326ffdbc6ebe3d617f5b8320e5a59bb83a4b9e1ff29aab (1)
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:27.174+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockRetriever | Received conflicting pivot blocks for 15378841.
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:27.174+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | WARN  | PivotBlockRetriever | 250 attempts have failed to find a fast sync pivot block
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:27.174+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockRetriever | Move pivot block back to 15378791 and retry.
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:27.174+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockConfirmer | Confirm pivot block 15378791 with at least 5 peers.
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:27.343+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-1 | INFO  | PivotBlockConfirmer | Received 1 confirmation(s) for pivot block header 15378791: 0x5b1659b72617a9249ecd565879137ef7d9ddadea972012917022fb559c5a6cdb

Received conflicting headers: 0xb7e64034e027a18ce3fa727965e19c55c2e58d1acd1cc7b9ee2a1e70e01d8652 (1),0x5b1659b72617a9249ecd565879137ef7d9ddadea972012917022fb559c5a6cdb (1)
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:27.354+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockRetriever | Received conflicting pivot blocks for 15378791.
execution_1           | 2022-08-22 16:31:27.354+00:00 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-4 | INFO  | PivotBlockRetriever | Max retries reached, cancel pivot block download.
```

Anecdotally, a user on reddit reported that their checkpoint sync failed. I haven't seen similar reports for snap sync.
- We know with some reasonable certainty that mainnet sync can fail or stall
- There's anecdotal evidence this may happen more often (or only) with checkpoint sync
[Trace Logs](https://www.dropbox.com/s/cgopp2lx4ads73z/besu-ckpt-sync-trace.log.gz?dl=0). I think this is a stalled checkpoint sync on mainnet.
Closing for latest changes to PoS sync.
